content.p: Print RCWs > Title 74 > Chapter 74.08A > Section 74.08A.060 74.08A.050 << 74.08A.060 >> 74.08A.100 PDF RCW 74.08A.060 Food stamp work requirements. Single adults without dependents between eighteen and fifty years of age shall comply with federal food stamp work requirements as a condition of eligibility. The department may exempt any counties or subcounty areas from the federal food stamp work requirements in P.L. 104-193, unless the department receives written evidence of official action by a county or subcounty governing entity, taken after noticed consideration, that indicates that a county or subcounty area chooses not to use an exemption to the federal food stamp work requirements. [ 1997 c 58 s 110 .]
